comments: Free energy pathway for nitrogen reduction on various active sites of rutile TiO2 (110)

data.comments: // The curly bracket starts a data series. A file can have more than one data series. The uid is an optional unique ID and can even be a doi, for example.  The name field is the name of the series and will appear in the legend.
data.name: (110) surface
data.extraInformation: This is just an example of how to add extra information for a series.

data.comments: // The curly bracket starts a data series. A file can have more than one data series. The uid is an optional unique ID and can even be a doi, for example.  The name field is the name of the series and will appear in the legend.
data.name: Fe substitution
data.extraInformation: This is just an example of how to add extra information for a series.

data.comments: // The curly bracket starts a data series. A file can have more than one data series. The uid is an optional unique ID and can even be a doi, for example.  The name field is the name of the series and will appear in the legend.
data.name: O vacancy

layout.comments: // The title field of the layout is the title of the graph (not of a series).

title.text: Free energy of N2 reduction intermediates (computed with BEEF-vdW)

xaxis.comments: // The x axis title must include the units that are expected.

title.text: N2 | N2* | N2H* | N2H2* | HNNH2* | H2NNH2* | NH2* + NH3* | 2NH3* | 2NH3

yaxis.comments: // The y axis title must include the units that are expected.
